comment1.author: Sam Skinner
comment1.text: It's good that you're doing this, but don't forget those OMM emails.

comment2.author: Christian Lemieux
comment2.text: Hello from my honeymoon. I'm sad that I missed out on this first debrief.

comment3.author: Eric Lee
comment3.text: I agree with this. Additionally, John's presentations usually cut to the point. It's good to have him start first because it sets the bar for the rest of the presentations.
